features.featureTitle: Generate and use a high-quality heart image asset that renders as a clearly recognizable, smooth, sharp heart shape. The graphic must have clean edges, proper heart proportions, and be visually premium â€” not distorted, abstract, or unclear. Use this asset in the FloatingHearts component to replace the current heart graphic. All animation properties (movement, speed, opacity, size variation, count, placement, z-index, layering, distribution) must remain exactly unchanged.

Generate and use a high-quality flower image asset that renders as a clearly recognizable flower with visible, properly shaped petals. The graphic should be aesthetically pleasing, realistic-looking, and premium. Use this asset in the FlowerRain component to replace the current flower graphic. All animation properties (falling behavior, timing, speed, count, intensity logic, placement, z-index) must remain exactly unchanged.

Generate and use a high-quality balloon image asset that renders as a clearly recognizable balloon with proper balloon shape and a visible string at the bottom. The graphic should be visually attractive and easily identifiable as a balloon. Use this asset in the BalloonAnimation component to replace the current balloon graphic. All animation properties (upward flying movement, speed, count, intensity balance, placement, z-index, layering) must remain exactly unchanged.
